skills.name: Dazzling Blades
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Sampo's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Ricochet Love
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Sampo's ATK to a single enemy, and further deals DMG for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> extra time(s), with each time dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Sampo's ATK to a random enemy.

skills.name: Surprise Present
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Sampo's ATK to all enemies, with a <unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> to increase the targets' DoT taken by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

skills.name: Windtorn Dagger
skills.desc: Sampo's attacks have a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> to inflict Wind Shear for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).\nEnemies inflicted with Wind Shear will take Wind DoT equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Sampo's ATK at the beginning of each turn. Wind Shear can stack up to <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> time(s).

skills.name: Shining Bright
skills.desc: After Sampo uses his Technique, enemies in a set area are inflicted with Blind for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> second(s). Blinded enemies cannot detect your team.\nWhen initiating combat against a Blinded enemy, there is a <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> <u>fixed chance</u> to delay all enemies' action by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Rising Love
eidolons.desc: When using Skill, deals DMG for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> extra time(s) to a random enemy.

eidolons.name: Infectious Enthusiasm
eidolons.desc: Defeating an enemy with Wind Shear has a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> base chance to inflict all enemies with <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> stack(s) of Wind Shear, equivalent to the Talent's Wind Shear.

eidolons.name: Big Money!
eidolons.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: The Deeper the Love, the Stronger the Hate
eidolons.desc: When Skill hits an enemy with <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> or more stack(s) of Wind Shear, the enemy immediately takes <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of current Wind Shear DMG.

eidolons.name: Huuuuge Money!
eidolons.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Increased Spending
eidolons.desc: Talent's Wind Shear DMG multiplier increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

skillTree.name: Trap
skillTree.desc: Extends the duration of Wind Shear caused by Talent by <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

skillTree.name: Spice Up
skillTree.desc: Enemies with Wind Shear effect deal <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> less DMG to Sampo.
